trackChooser.title: Choose your Journey Now
trackChooser.subtitle: & Become a digital shaper of tomorrow

support.title: Support Tech Education
support.body: Help us empower the next generation by funding cohorts and resources.

free.title: Totally free
free.body: We free your mind for what matters the most to the wold, unlocking your true potential

network.title: Networking
network.body: Expand your network through our community for potential job opportunities or startups

job.title: Job Ready
job.body: You create a project that build your portfolio as a fundamental step towards your dream job

tracks.title: Choose Your Track
tracks.description: Select the technology track that matches your interests and career goals

page.title: Learning Tracks - TechLabs
page.description: Explore our learning tracks: Web Development, Data Science, Product Design, and AI. Choose the path that fits your career goals and start learning for free.
page.keywords: learning tracks, web development, data science, product design, AI, tech education, free courses

web-dev.label: Web Development
web-dev.description: Learn modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks. Build responsive websites and web applications.

data-science.label: Data Science
data-science.description: Master data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling. Work with real datasets and build predictive models.

product-design.label: Product Design
product-design.description: Design user-centered digital products using modern design tools and methodologies. Learn UX/UI principles and prototyping.

ai.label: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Explore AI fundamentals, machine learning algorithms, and neural networks. Build intelligent systems and applications.

page.title: About Us - TechLabs
page.description: Learn about TechLabs mission to provide free tech education, our program approach, timeline, team, and frequently asked questions.
page.keywords: about techlabs, mission, program, team, timeline, FAQ, tech education

missionSection.title: Empowering the Next Generation of Tech Leaders
missionSection.subtitle: TechLabs is a non-profit organization dedicated to making technology education accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or financial situation.
missionSection.description: We believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to learn in-demand tech skills and build a career in the digital economy. Through our innovative blended learning approach, we combine online resources with local community support to create a unique learning experience that prepares students for real-world success.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Free education for all, breaking down financial barriers to tech careers

community.title: Community
community.description: Local networks of learners, mentors, and industry professionals

practicality.title: Practicality
practicality.description: Real-world projects and skills that employers actually need

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Blended learning that combines the best of online and offline education

programSection.title: How Our Program Works
programSection.description: TechLabs offers a unique blended learning experience that combines the flexibility of online learning with the support of a local community.

application.title: Application & Selection
application.description: Apply online with your background and goals. We select candidates based on motivation and potential, not prior experience.

foundation.title: Foundation Learning
foundation.description: Build core skills through our online platform with support from mentors and peers.

project.title: Project Development
project.description: Work on real-world projects that build your portfolio and demonstrate your skills.

career.title: Career Launch
career.description: Get support with job applications, networking, and career planning.

teamSection.title: Meet Our Team
teamSection.description: Our team combines expertise in education, technology, and community building to create the best possible learning experience.

sarah.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
sarah.bio: Former Google engineer with 15+ years in tech education and community development.

marcus.name: Marcus Weber
marcus.bio: Curriculum designer with expertise in adult education and skill development.

lisa.bio: Passionate about building inclusive communities and connecting people through technology.

contactSection.title: Get in Touch
contactSection.description: Have questions about our program or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.

home.title: TechLabs - Learn Tech Skills for Free
home.description: Learn tech skills for free with TechLabs. Blended learning, local community, practical projects. Winner of Google.org Impact Challenge Germany 2018.
home.keywords: tech education, free coding, web development, data science, product design, AI, digital skills, Germany
